title: Amperity Introduces the First Enterprise Customer Data Agent that Turns AI Insight Into Live Segments and Journeys
summary: Amperity, an AI-powered Customer Data Cloud, has launched its Customer Data Agent, an enterprise AI agent that combines AI insights with actionable results. The new tool is built on unified customer data and enhances Amperity's existing segmentation and journey capabilities, making insights more accessible and enabling marketers to create segments and journeys with greater speed and confidence. This represents a significant step in applying AI to marketing and customer service.
hook: Amperity's new AI agent accelerates customer segmentation and journey creation.

title: GoDaddy’s New ANS Marketplace Tells You Which AI Agents You Can Trust
summary: GoDaddy has launched the next phase of its Agent Name Service (ANS), introducing the ANS Marketplace. The marketplace allows entrepreneurs, developers, and platforms to discover ANS-verified AI agents, understand their workings, and see trust signals in action. ANS is GoDaddy's trusted identity naming system for AI agents, aimed at protecting the internet and users from rogue AI agents.
hook: GoDaddy's ANS Marketplace: A new platform to trust AI agents.

title: Vonage Deepens Native Contact Center with Salesforce’s Agentforce Voice Integrations
summary: Vonage, now a part of Ericsson, has integrated its Contact Center with Salesforce’s Agentforce 360, creating a unified, AI-powered platform for enhanced customer experience. The integration combines Vonage for Salesforce Voice with Agentforce Voice, Salesforce’s voice-powered AI agent, transforming contact centers into personalized, scalable customer engagement platforms. This strategic move combines voice and AI, potentially revolutionizing the contact center industry.
hook: Vonage integrates with Salesforce's Agentforce, creating a unified AI-powered customer service platform!

title: MarTech Interview with Jackie Palmer, VP of Product Marketing @ ActiveCampaign
summary: ActiveCampaign's VP of Product Marketing, Jackie Palmer, discusses the company's shift towards an AI-first and outcome-oriented approach. This strategic move is aimed at enhancing their product vision and influencing the martech ecosystem. The focus on AI indicates a potential for advancements in customer service and contact center technology.
hook: ActiveCampaign shifts to AI-first approach, influencing the martech ecosystem.

title: MarTech Interview With Philipp Heltewig, Chief AI Officer @ NiCE and General Manager at NiCE Cognigy
summary: NiCE Cognigy is leveraging advanced conversational and generative AI to enhance customer experiences by providing faster, more consistent, and more human-like interactions. The AI agents are utilized to qualify leads, answer product queries, and guide customers through purchase or renewal processes in real time across any channel. The company has also launched an AI Ops Center to ensure reliability.
hook: NiCE Cognigy enhances CX with advanced conversational AI and new AI Ops Center.

title: Fivetran Selected by Vistaprint to Power Data Activation and Personalized Customer Experiences
summary: Vistaprint has chosen Fivetran, a global leader in automated data movement, to aid its transition towards modern data activation and AI-ready customer experiences. Fivetran will provide secure, automated data pipelines and reverse ETL, allowing Vistaprint to integrate governed first-party data directly into its daily tools across its marketing and customer engagement ecosystem. This move signifies a strategic shift towards AI in customer service for Vistaprint.
hook: Vistaprint embraces AI, selects Fivetran for data activation and personalized CS!

title: Fivetran Selected by Vistaprint to Power Data Activation and Personalized Customer Experiences
summary: Vistaprint has chosen Fivetran, a leader in automated data movement, to aid in its transition towards modern data activation and AI-ready customer experiences. Fivetran will provide secure, automated data pipelines and reverse ETL, allowing Vistaprint to connect governed first-party data directly into its everyday tools across its marketing and customer engagement ecosystem. This move signifies Vistaprint's commitment to leveraging AI to enhance customer service and engagement.
hook: Vistaprint taps Fivetran for AI-powered data activation and personalized customer experiences.

title: Dialpad and TD SYNNEX Partner to Bring Agentic AI Communications to Global Markets
summary: Dialpad, an AI-powered business communications platform, has partnered with TD SYNNEX, a global technology solutions aggregator and distributor. The partnership will extend Dialpad's reach to TD SYNNEX's international technology partners, allowing them to offer Dialpad’s unified communications (UCaaS), contact center (CCaaS), and Agentic AI solutions to businesses globally. This move expands the availability of AI-enabled communication and customer service solutions in the global market.
hook: Dialpad partners with TD SYNNEX to globally distribute AI-powered CS solutions!
